query: ALTER TABLE jobs MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('pending_supplier_acceptance', 'supplier_accepted', 'sent_to_engineer', 'engineer_accepted', 'declined', 'en_route', 'on_site', 'completed', 'cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending_supplier_acceptance'
